id.description: The unique identifier of the created comment.

title.description: The title of the created comment.

description.description: The description of the created comment.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user who posted the comment.

task_id.description: The unique identifier of the task to which the comment belongs.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the comment was created.

edited.description: Indicates whether the comment has been edited or not.
